verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With hind's feet on high places
I will run after Thee(2x)
Chorus:
I will run, I will run, I will run after Thee.
I will run, I will run, I will run after Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will run the race set before me
I will run after Thee(2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will run as though to win
I will run after Thee(2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
From glory unto glory
I will run after Thee(2x)
